snippet: The trading firm reached a deal with an investor consortium that included TD Ameritrade and the Blackstone Group, capping efforts to stay in business.
abstract: The trading firm reached a deal with an investor consortium that included TD Ameritrade and the Blackstone Group, capping efforts to stay in business.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED and NATHANIEL POPPER

headline.main: Knight Capital Reaches Rescue Deal With Investor Group
headline.print_headline: Knight Capital Reaches Rescue Deal With Investor Group
